name: Pelham Bay Skatepark
description: Solid neighborhood park near Pelham Bay Park with a good flow layout and smooth concrete.
history: Built as part of NYC Parks' initiative to add skateparks to every borough. Serves the northeast Bronx skating community.
bestTimes: Weekday afternoons. Quiet spot that never gets too packed.
transitDirections: 6 train to Pelham Bay Park, short walk east.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, rails, ledges, bank, pyramid. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Bronx skate scene in Pelham Bay. Built as part of NYC Parks' initiative to add skateparks to every borough. Serves the northeast Bronx skating community.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 6 train to Pelham Bay Park, short walk east.. Weekday afternoons. Quiet spot that never gets too packed.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
